pyannote/pyannote-audio

Pyannote.audio lets you do speaker diarization in Python with PyTorch—just load your audio and get who spoke when

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • open source speech recognition toolkit with ASR, VAD, speaker verification, and model zoo
  • open source audio model for expressive speech and voice cloning
  • python tool for microsoft edge text-to-speech
  • Framework for real-time speaker diarization
  • Transcribes audio into notes on your infrastructure
  • Transcribes voice notes into summaries and action items
  • Speech-to-text model for audio transcription, translation, and language detection
  • edit spoken-word audio with automatic transcription
